thread.title: Date confirmed for Leicester City game
thread.title_full: Date confirmed for Leicester City game

title: Date confirmed for Leicester City game
text:
Search the entire site Date confirmed for Leicester City game 
Our Premier League fixture against Leicester City had initially been postponed due to a fixture clash with our Emirates FA Cup quarter-final win over Lincoln City. 
However, we have today received confirmation that it will now take place as under: 
Arsenal v Leicester CityKick-off: 7.45pmLive on: Sky Sports We are still awaiting confirmation from the Premier League on when our matches against Southampton and Sunderland will be played.
